name: Super Minion Bros. (with Level Editor)
description:
Help an tiny pixel minion to save the baby dinosaur prince.

This game is non-profit and only for educational purposes.

With mobile touch support.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

How to play:

Left/Right Arrows to move

Spacebar to jump

Hold jump button when land on an enemy to bounce higher

If picked up fire-power, can use D to shoot fireballs

If picked up feather-power, can hold Spacebar/Jump to glide while falling

DISCLAIMER:

Made for educational purpose only.  Cannot be used for develop commercial games. This game is built purely for education purposes. It is not meant for wide distribution. 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you want to know how to make this game, stay tuned for my blogs releasing soon.
